# Food Safety Consultant

## Contract Details:

* Title: Food Safety Consultant
* Solicitation Number: 21120-24-4513990
* Tender Closing Date: January 19th, 2024, at 4:00 PM.
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1st, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: February 1st, 2027

## Service Description:

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a Food Safety and Quality consultant with expertise in cook-chill and reduced oxygen packaging processes. The consultant will provide technical guidance to support the CSC's Food Safety and Quality (FSQ) Program and food production processes at its five Regional Food Production Centers (RFPCs).

## Key Objectives:

1. Review, revise, and validate the FSQ program.
2. Provide recommendations for continuous improvement of food production processes at RFPCs.
3. Develop training tools and resources related to the FSQ program.
4. Analyze critical food safety deviations to determine product safety and provide recommendations for corrective actions.

## Desired Deliverables:

* Specific, task-based deliverables and timelines, as mutually agreed upon between the CSC project authority and the contractor.
* Reports, documents, and resource materials, created using Microsoft Office products and delivered electronically.
* Copies of evidence used to support the validation of the FSQ program.
* Digitally signed validation letters, confirming the effectiveness of the FSQ program in controlling food safety and quality hazards.

## Tender Details:

* Tender Status: Expired.
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal.
* Procurement Category: SRV (Service Réglementé).
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price.
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada.
* Regions of Delivery: New Brunswick, Alberta, National Capital Region (NCR), British Columbia.

For more information and to access tender documents, please visit: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/. [^1]

[^1] Tender documents can be accessed through the Shared Catalogue Ordering System (SCOS) or Canada Buys (canadabuys.canada.ca).
